ygData.subject: Re: Human Shadow Knight Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... How about this:  Kill Commander Windstream (at least 23rd level), and assemble the Thex Mallet value 20pp+.  Turn it in for a Ringmail Coif, value 3pp+.
ygData.messageBody:
Countess Bathory D'Allatu wrote:
>
> From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
> All that work and we received squat. VERY
> disappointing.
>

How about this: Kill Commander Windstream (at least 23rd level), and
assemble the Thex Mallet value 20pp+. Turn it in for a Ringmail Coif,
value 3pp+.

Most all the quests suffer from poor rewards. Do the quests for fun,
and faction, but don't count on a great reward.

One more thing, the reward you get is dependent on your faction, or
so I have heard.

Xilith
